summary: A project with a GUI that includes cards, a sun/moon theme toggle, and various UI elements. Currently implementing a full light/dark theme toggle that applies globally across the entire page.

existing_features.title: Implement a full page light/dark theme toggle triggered by the sun/moon icon in the header.
